{"id":506323483,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1623404077,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/506323483/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Hexspeak","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string toHexspeak(string num) {\n        stringstream stream;\n        stream << hex << stol(num);\n        string res = stream.str();\n        for (char& i: res) {\n            if (isalpha(i)) {\n                i = toupper(i);\n                continue;\n            }\n            if (i == '0') i = 'O';\n            else if (i == '1') i = 'I';\n            else return \"ERROR\";\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"hexspeak"}
